mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_LAB_RESULT_INFO (TEST_NO, LAB_SOURCE, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, RESULT, ABNORMAL_INDICATOR, UNITS, REFERENCE_RANGE, RESULT_DATE_TIME, LAB_DATE, SPECIMEN, NOTES_FOR_SPCM, SPCM_SAMPLE_DATE_TIME, SPCM_RECEIVED_DATE_TIME, INS_DEPT_CODE, INS_DEPT_NAME, CLIN_DIAG, LAB_DOCTOR_CODE, LAB_DOCTOR_NAME, REVIEW_DOCTOR_CODE, REVIEW_DOCTOR_NAME) values (#{testNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abnormalIndicator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referenceRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{labDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{specimen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notesForSpcm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spcmSampleDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spcmReceivedDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clinDiag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labDoctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDoctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select TEST_NO, LAB_SOURCE, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, RESULT, ABNORMAL_INDICATOR, UNITS, REFERENCE_RANGE, RESULT_DATE_TIME, LAB_DATE, SPECIMEN, NOTES_FOR_SPCM, SPCM_SAMPLE_DATE_TIME, SPCM_RECEIVED_DATE_TIME, INS_DEPT_CODE, INS_DEPT_NAME, CLIN_DIAG, LAB_DOCTOR_CODE, LAB_DOCTOR_NAME, REVIEW_DOCTOR_CODE, REVIEW_DOCTOR_NAME from V_HIS_LAB_RESULT_INFO
